import React, { Component } from 'react' import PageFooter from './PageFooter' import CloseIcon from './img/close-icon.svg'; import LongArrowBlack from './img/long-arrow-black.svg'; const Case3Content = () => { return (

Bolon

Innovators at heart

01

Context

Bolon is a high end flooring manufacturer who frequently collaborates with famous designs and architects from the entire world. For this project Bolon came to us with a request to design three campaign sites as well as new product pages to launch several new collections.

02

Process

As time was short me and our CD at that time move in to a war room and worked focused with the task for two weeks. The main challenge was to find a look and feel that could be applied to all four sites. User experience had to be baked in to the general design as there was no time for a separate UX process. This was risky but worked since the sites had a relatively low complexity when it came to the flow and structure.
To my experiences a small and focused team working closely with the client often produces the best results and are able to to so in a short time. Being able to shut out all other distractions and find a good flow was what made this project successful despite the short time frame.

03

Realisation

We managed to make a common design language yet differentiate the sites from each other. They also share a lot with Bolons earlier style, but also manages to explore some new visual directions. It was challenging but fun to sketch and iterate on multiple design directions at the same time. And it was rewarding to see them built and launched in such a short time.
The sites were developed by Level Nine and went live in time for the launch of the new collections.
